backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: You have spent your life in service to a temple, learning sacred rites and providing assistance to priests.

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: You are an experienced criminal with a history of breaking the law.

backgrounds.name: Folk Hero
backgrounds.description: You come from a humble social rank, but you are destined for so much more.

backgrounds.name: Noble
backgrounds.description: You understand wealth, power, and privilege. You carry a noble title.

backgrounds.name: Sage
backgrounds.description: You spent years learning the lore of the multiverse, poring over tomes and scrolls.

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember.
equipment: Trophy taken from a fallen enemy

backgrounds.name: Hermit
backgrounds.description: You lived in seclusion, either in a sheltered community or entirely alone.

backgrounds.name: Outlander
backgrounds.description: You grew up in the wilds, far from civilization and the comforts of town and city.

backgrounds.name: Guild Artisan
backgrounds.description: You are a member of an artisan's guild, skilled in a particular field.
equipment: Letter of introduction from your guild

backgrounds.name: Entertainer
backgrounds.description: You thrive in front of an audience, telling stories, playing music, or dancing.
